§ 9562. Clothing The President may prescribe the quantity and kind of clothing to be issued annually to members of the Air Force and members of the Space Force. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 577; Pub. L. 116–283, div. A, title IX, § 923(e)(3), Jan. 1, 2021, 134 Stat. 3816.)
